H0.text: Which football league championship side plays home games at Keepmoat Stadium. Barnsley FC

H1.text: Which football league championship side plays home games at Keepmoat Stadium. Sheffield United FC

H2.text: Which football league championship side plays home games at Keepmoat Stadium. Rotherham United FC

H3.text: Which football league championship side plays home games at Keepmoat Stadium. DRFC

A4.text: Rotherham United play their home matches at the New York Stadium, not at Keepmoat Stadium.

A5.text: On 19 June 2012, it was confirmed that Doncaster Rovers had secured a 99-year operating lease from Doncaster Metropolitan Borough Council to lead the management of the stadium with a view to improving operating results across the stadium sports partnership.

A6.text: The official opening of the Keepmoat Stadium was on 3 August 2007, with Doncaster Rovers playing a Manchester United XI in front of a crowd of 13,080.
